122.title: Hope's story

choices: Let Hope go because he likes the hunt.
1221.content: Hope was about to finish a story about a girl in a mansion on the run from a hungry snake named Hate.It was late at night and Hope was to tired to write any more and fell asleep.When Hope oped her eyes she was in a large bed.Hope looked around and as her eyes looked into the black room she saw that she was not in her room but a large room full of toys that look like thay belonged to a rich girl about her age.She then saw a large glass tank with the top on the ground.Hope was thinking about how she got here.And then she recalled her story and how the girl would be attacked by a Snake named Hate.Just then Hope was being tied up by a giant tail."Hello little girl.How nice that you didn't close my tank all the way now I can have a little snack."The snake opened it's mouth and Hope yelled."No!Please don't eat me!"Hate looked down at Hope and.....
1221.title: Hope and Hate

choices: News flash: You're not in your room
132.content:
You were busy typing.

It's not your usual time of day to write, but writing you were.

Eighteen's a sure age for anybody to write full time on just about anything. Legal age for porn, legal age for drinking. Ditchin your parents, and...
And, as you pick up the needle, not exactly the legal age for drugs.

You see, your family had divorced a few years ago, and because of that you were forced to move out of the house, not wanting to be involved in the dispute between father and mother. Not as though they really did care for you, as a matter of fact.
Each of you went your seperate ways.
You moved to warm, sandy beaches, your mother stayed in Hazard, and your father, (for some mysterious reason or other) ditched the country.

You looked at the needle, and put it one side...
Started to continue on your story.

It was raining outside, hard. The wind was hammering at the windows and you could hear the tiles on the roof starting to rip loose, but couldn't bring yourself to care really. You're here, and nothing will ever tear you away from where you were, not that you knew exactly where you were either.
Suddenly you saw a purple flash of light, and stopped, for just a moment.
Looking up, you noticed another purple flash...
"What the hell?"
Must be the drugs.
Then, it struck you, all the dazzling colors of the rainbow, all the songs going through your mind, and...
ironically enough...
you remembered a word you didn't see in a long time.

A word of a World you created about two years ago, when your parents started to divorce...
Scope.

And, darkness claimed you...


You hear birds singing, you see light. You feel hard board behind your back, painfully you flinch. If this was your room, your place... where's the roof?
132.title: Scope

1321.content:
You must've knocked your head hard against something as you tried to get up.

Suddenly, a very sharp looking stone meets your nose. It felt real enough for you to move your eyes up towards the owner of whatever this was.
"Who are you?"
"Uh..."
"Say your name!" It was a male voice, but it certainly didn't look male
"Jason."
"Where do you come from?"
"Florida..."
"Don't know the region..." The creature seemed a bit puzzled, looked at the sky, and you did too.
There were many... moons?
Or were they planets.
"Outlander?"
"Wha-?"
You felt something hard hit your head from the side, and you fell onto what seemed to be a stone altar.
"Don';t play games!"

"Tenin..."
As you shot an upward look at your assailant, you found a vague memory of such name...
"Kli..."
A dragon also appeared from the sky, somebody riding on the back of its neck, which jumped off with a perfect landing in front of you.
"Who's this man?"
"What I'm trying to find out."
"Tenin, killing him won't give answer..."
"Would make me feel better afterwards."
"How long ago did he arrive?"
"Two sunrises ago."
Two days?
Unconscious?
Woah.
You must've had a lot of crack.

"Kill him."
"Whoa, wait."
Everybody looked towards you, you didn't realize you spoke out until it got deafly silent.
1321.title: Infantasy and Beyond

14.content: Whats your name and what style do you write?
14.title: 18 something

choices: A long forgotten land kingdom type
141.content:
Your mother rolls her hand over your shoulder gently getting a groggy response out of you. You raise your head up reveling a white spot on your forehead where it was resting on your textbook.
"Happy birthday honey" Your mother says to you smiling presenting you with a small cupcake with a single candle in it.
"Oh mom" You say looking at the clock showing 2:30. She had just gotten home from work, and you knew that she wanted to see you before you went to school. Your mother lights the candle and asks you to make a wish. You think to yourself and wish that mom did not have to work so much or the long hours that she has before blowing out the candle.
"Oh I got you something" Your mother says smiling as she walks out of the room returning a second later with a wrapped gift. You unwrap it gently finding a leather bound Journal.
"There is something inside for you also. I know how much you love to write and seen this and thought it would be perfect." Your mother says before a yawn escapes her lips.
"Well, I need to get to bed I think. They will call me back in around eight to cover for Becky again." Your mother says hugging you as you thank her.
The room goes quiet and you unbutton the Journal to revel $60 inside and smile knowing how hard mom works. Looking at the page you see some text. This Journal contains the works from_____. You pull out your pen and write your name into the Journal before turning the page and staring at the blank page before you. Your pen makes contact with the page, and you begin writing an opening setting...
141.title: Happy Birthday
